metadata.title: CONNECT MY DEVICES
metadata.description: Connect your Fitbit, Garmin, Oura Ring, iPhone or Apple Watch through a simple process.

metadata.title: TELL US WHAT YOU THINK
metadata.description: 7 quick questions about joining the study

eligibility.title: Check You Can Take Part
eligibility.description:
_You can join the study if you answer Yes to all **four questions**. Please scroll down to complete all four questions._
_If your answer is No to any of the questions, and you want to leave the page, click the exit button on your left._

items.description: Have you had knee replacement (total, or partial), either through the NHS or a private healthcare provider, between 1st January 2017 and 31st December 2023?
Were you over 18 years of age at the time of your knee replacement?

Did you use a Fitbit, iPhone, Apple Watch, Garmin or Oura Ring to track your activity six months or more before your knee replacement? _Click Yes, if you use an iPhone, it automatically collects physical activity data._

Did you use a Fitbit, iPhone, Apple Watch, Garmin or Oura Ring to track your activity one year or more after your knee replacement? _Click Yes, if you use an iPhone, it automatically collects physical activity data._

consent.title: Consent
consent.description:
_Before you can take part in this study, we need your consent. Please read carefully the consent statements and click Yes or No for each statement._
You will need to scroll down to sign the consent form.

requiredItems.description: I confirm that I have read the attached information sheet (Version 3.0, Date xx/xx/xx) for the above study and have had the opportunity to consider the information and ask questions and had these answered satisfactorily.

I understand that my participation in the study is voluntary and that I am free to withdraw at any time without giving a reason and without detriment to myself. I understand that it will not be possible to remove my data from the project once it has been anonymised and forms part of the data set.

I agree to take part on this basis.

I understand my involvement in this study involves:
- Answering an online survey on a platform hosted by King’s College London and
- Allowing the PAPrKA team to:
  - access physical activity data from my fitness tracker provider.
  - access data about my knee replacement from the National Joint Registry.
  - work with the National Joint Registry to link and analyse my physical activity data, knee replacement data, and survey data to answer the PAPrKA study questions.

I give permission for the PAPrKA team to access my physical activity data stored with my fitness tracker provider. This means the PAPrKA team will collect any data available between January 2016 and December 2024.
I give permission for the PAPrKA team to access my knee replacement data stored with the National Joint Registry to collect information for the study.

I give permission for the PAPrKA team to share my identifying information (full name, date of birth, NHS number, sex and postcode) with the National Joint Registry, to allow for my knee replacement data, physical activity data and survey response to be linked.

I understand that the data linkage involves two stages:
- First, the National Joint Registry will filter out my knee replacement data and replace my identifying information with the study identification. 
- Second, the PAPrKA team will add my physical activity and survey data to the data in the first step to form the complete linked data.

I give permission for my data to be linked.
I give permission for the PAPrKA team to work with researchers at the National Joint Registry to analyse my linked data to answer the study’s research questions.
I agree that any data collected may be included in anonymous form in **publications, academic theses, dissertations, or conference presentations.**

I understand that data collected during the study may be looked at by individuals from the University of Manchester or regulatory authorities, where it is relevant to my taking part in this research. I give permission for these individuals to have access to my data.
I agree to take part in this study.

optionalItems.description:
I agree my physical activity data, survey data and demographic data, being held at Manchester University, can be used by other researchers, to answer research questions over and above those for the PAPrKA study.

I agree on the basis that only pseudonymised data will be shared and where there are data protection measures in place to ensure the confidentiality of the data.

I would like to take part in the prize draw

I understand that my full name and email address will be passed to the University's Finance team for the sole purpose of sending me the Amazon voucher, If I agree to take part in the prize draw and win.
I agree that the researchers may contact me in future about other research projects.
I agree that the researchers may retain my contact details in order to provide me with a summary of the findings for this study.

consent.signatureDescription:
Please draw or type your signature in the box below and press the Save button. 

_Please note, drawing or typing your signature is the same as signing a paper form with a pen._

_Please check your responses carefully before you submit_

account.title: Register Account Continued
account.description:
**You need an account to join the PAPrKA study.**
Set up your account by providing an email address and creating a password. You will need to verify your account. **Do not forget to safely store your password.**
Please note that if you have signed a consent form but choose not to register for an account, we cannot reach out to you.

studyInformation.title: Study Information
studyInformation.content: We understand that you may have questions about our research, what your involvement would be and much more. Please read carefully the Participant Information Sheet to find answers to these questions. If you have any questions about what you have read, please feel free to contact the team on and __teams account__. In addition, you may wish to talk to a family member or friend about taking part in this study before you go on to sign the consent form.

portal.title: What You Need to Complete PAPrKA Study Tasks
portal.content:
Task 1

Month and Year of knee replacement surgery

Task 2

NHS number

You can find your NHS number here: https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-services/online-services/find-nhs-number/ or sign into your NHS App or check any letter from your GP.

Task 3 (for Fitbit, Garmin or Oura Ring users)

Login details for your Fitbit or Garmin or Oura Ring.

 

Task 3 (for iPhone or Apple watch users)

To login you will need, you may want to write it down

1.        Study Name: PAPrKA 

2.        Email address

3.        Password and you used to set up your PAPrKA account.

Preferably be connected to a WIFI

Task 4

Your views on joining the study

*When you have completed the task, click the "Finished" button on the top right.*

finishContent.title: Thank you
finishContent.content:
You have successfully joined the PAPrKA research study.
Thanks to your contribution, our research will help millions of people living with knee osteoarthritis who will undergo knee replacement surgeries in the future.
The results of the study will be published at the end of 2026. You can receive regular updates and be the first to hear the results by subscribing to our newsletter
